# HMCharacteristicValueTamperedStatus.tampered

**Case**

The accessory has been tampered with.

## Declaration

```swift
case tampered
```

## Tampered Status

- **HMCharacteristicValueTamperedStatus.none**: The accessory has not been tampered with.

items.description: The accessory has not been tampered with.
